Shivah::

Shivah felt sudenly interesting due what Lunarpine had said and said 
by comm link"What sort of information you have about that 
megalomaniac traitor?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OOC Foxfingers has been inside the base as long as Razor Claw has.
> 
> BIC...
> Lunarpine listened carefully and knew there was a major snag to the
> agreement. Veratis' anti-weapons policy made it impossible to get 
weapons.
> He was a warrior not a diplomat. But this time he was the only 
thing that
> was close. "I can give you the anti-virus but I don't have access 
to any
> weapons." The mention of disturbing dragons gave him an idea.  He 
thought
> back to the incedent at the CF involving Megaton. The dragon had 
said
> something about representing these Predacons. If he were working 
here then
> the Preds would already have all the information they needed so 
obviously he
> wasn't here at the moment. "I understand you have had contact with 
a mutant
> named Megaton, I could offer you information about him you probably 
don't
> have on record."
